data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Deoghar, Jharkhand, India to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Deoghar, Jharkhand, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who are far from you in Deoghar. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 1,492,100 people living in the county of Deoghar.
Father, please give the church in the county of Deoghar prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Mundari people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, for those in trouble in the county of Deoghar prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Deoghar, Jharkhand, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.section_summary:
the county of Deoghar, Jharkhand, India has a population of 1,492,100.

We estimate Deoghar has 16,413 people who might know Jesus, 18,104 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,457,583 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Deoghar, Jharkhand, India, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

location.name: Deoghar
location.people_groups_list: Ganda, Khadura, Aoghar, Beldar Laria (Hindu traditions), Nagarchi (Muslim traditions)
